43.ara-name: كتاب الأدب عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Zaid bin Arqam:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Whoever does not take from his mustache, then he is not from us

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي قَصِّ الشَّارِبِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Paring The Moustache
